description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian said on Thursday that “legitimate defense” to punish Israel is a “necessity” as the regime violated international law and the Vienna conventions by attacking Iran’s consulate in Damascus on April 1.
title: Punishing Israel as an aggressor is legitimate defense, Iran tells Germany

description: Samantha Power, the director of the US Agency for International Development (USAID), says that people in parts of northern Gaza have begun facing famine.
title: Famine is already occurring in northern Gaza: US official

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s Parliament Speaker Mohammad Bagher Ghalibaf said on Wednesday that the Zionist regime with its latest heinous and horrible crime proved that it does not have the slightest adherence to humanitarian principles and international law.
title: Iran’s speaker says Zionists have no adherence to humanitarian, international laws

description: TEHRAN - Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi has emphasized that the most effective way to stand against Israel would be for Islamic countries to cut off economic and political relations with the regime.
title: Cutting economic and political ties with Israel is most effective way: Iran president tells Erdogan

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian said on Wednesday that the Israeli regime massacre of the Hamas leader’s family members only speeds up the regime’s certain collapse.
title: Amir Abdollahian says Israel speeded up collapse by killing Hamas leader’s sons

description: Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi said on Wednesday that an Israeli bombardment that killed three sons of the Hamas leader was another sign of the Zionist regime’s savagery.
title: Iranian president calls killing of Hamas leader’s sons proof of Israeli savagery
